    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_107591</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_107591</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Electromagnetic induction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektromagnetische Induktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Induction électromagnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Indução eletromagnética</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Induzione elettromagnetica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρομαγνητική επαγωγή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inducción electromágnetica</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of two illustrations showing ways of inducing current in wires using magnets. The figure shows how the man moves the magnet up and down next to a stationary wire in a circuit to induce electric current to flow through it.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnetic induction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">induced current flow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stationary wire</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von zwei Abbildungen, die 
Methoden des induzierten Stroms in den Leitungen mit Magneten zeigen. 
Die Abbildung zeigt, wie der Mann den Magneten auf und ab nahe 
bei einer stationären Leitung in einem Stromkreis verschiebt, um 
elektrischen Strom zu verursachen, um ihn durchzufließen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de deux illustrations montrant des 
voies du courant induisant en fils à l'aide des aimants. La 
figure montre comment l'homme déplace l'aimant en haut et en bas à 
côté d'un fil stationnaire dans un circuit pour induire le courant 
électrique pour le traverser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de duas ilustrações que mostram 
maneiras da corrente de indução nos fios usando ímãs. A 
figura mostra como o homem move o ímã para cima e para baixo ao lado
de um fio estacionário em um circuito para induzir a corrente 
elétrica para correr através d.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di due illustrazioni che mostrano
i modi della corrente di induzione in legare per mezzo dei magneti. 
La figura mostra come l'uomo sposta il magnete su e giù vicino 
ad un legare stazionario in un circuito per indurre la corrente 
elettrica per attraversarla.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη δύο απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν τρόπους το 
ρεύμα στα καλώδια που χρησιμοποιούν τους μαγνήτες. Ο 
αριθμός επιδεικνύει πώς το άτομο κινεί το μαγνήτη πάνω-κάτω 
δίπλα σε ένα στάσιμο καλώδιο σε ένα κύκλωμα για να προτρέψει το
ηλεκτρικό ρεύμα για να διατρέξει του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de dos ilustraciones que 
muestran maneras de la corriente que induce en alambres usando los 
imanes. La figura muestra cómo el hombre mueve el imán hacia 
arriba y hacia abajo al lado de un alambre inmóvil en un circuito 
para inducir a la corriente eléctrica que la atraviese.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrischer Stromkreis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektromagnetische Induktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geverursachter aktueller Fluß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stationäre Leitung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">circuit électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">induction électromagnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écoulement actuel induit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">aimant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fil stationnaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">circuito elétrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">indução eletromagnética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fluxo atual induzido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ímã</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fio estacionário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">circuito elettrico</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνήτης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">circuito eléctrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">inducción electromágnetica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
